messages.subject: Blogs (multi  posting)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi My DD10 has just created her own unschooling blog and webring and is very keen for people to join so I promised her I would post a message on some of my
messages.messageBody:
Hi
My DD10 has just created her own unschooling blog and webring and is very keen for people to join so I promised her I would post a message on some of my mailing lists (also a push for my blog).
I think the main attraction is people posting comments (which I can totally relate to! LOL). So if anyone knows any kids with blogs or just wants to come have a look at hers, I'm sure DD would be truly grateful.
www.beingbumble.blogspot.com


Stacey & family www.climbingthefarawaytree.blogspot.com
Unschooling in New Zealand


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
